testcase.name: Login for Free CRM
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the home page..............................................passed When title of the home page is Free CRM.....................................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed Then user is on login page..................................................passed Then user enters email and password.........................................passed Then user clicks on submit button...........................................passed Then user is able to login to his account...................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
